name: Shattered Earth (WIP)
description:
(game was last updated around 2017, will return to it someday)

This is very much in development.

All programming, art and sounds are by me.

Lots of the art is probably licensed to people and I just line-traced it, so..... don't tell anyone.

You play as an astronaut in space, where what used to be Earth has been shattered into billions of shards. Right now the game is just a map where you can move, but in the future there will be plot, survival, NPCs, and base building. 

The game is procedurally generated. Use mouse left click to shoot a hook, mouse right click to jump, WASD to climb, B to place struts, and some other keys possibly. F2 should open a tutorial text thingie on the screen (it says F! but it's actually F2).
